POLICY

Welcome to San Marcos Orthopedics, where we are committed to providing you with a seamless and secure online experience. Please read this policy statement to understand the terms and conditions governing your use of our website.

By accessing or using San Marcos Orthopedics, you agree to comply with and be bound by the terms of this policy. If you do not agree, please refrain from using our services. Users are expected to engage with our website responsibly and refrain from any activities that may disrupt, damage, or impair our services. Any misuse or unauthorized access is strictly prohibited.

All content, logos, and materials on our website are the property of [Your Company] and are protected by intellectual property laws. Users are prohibited from reproducing, distributing, or modifying any content without explicit consent. Some features of our website may require account creation. Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account information and are liable for any activities conducted through their accounts.

Your privacy is important to us. Refer to our Privacy Statement for information on how we collect, use, and protect your personal data. Our website may use cookies to enhance user experience. By using our website, you consent to the use of cookies as described in our Cookie Policy.

San Marcos Orthopedics may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the content or privacy practices of these external sites. We reserve the right to terminate or restrict access to our website for users who violate our policies or engage in activities detrimental to the site's operation.

We may update this policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices. Users are encouraged to review this page regularly for the latest information. For inquiries or concerns regarding this policy, please contact us at admin@smorthopedics.com. By using our website, you acknowledge and agree to abide by the terms and conditions outlined in this policy statement.
